name: Oak Timber
description: Reliable timber for houses, palisades, and wagons.

name: Pine Planks
description: Light, resinous planks favored for scaffolds and cheap hulls.

name: Birch Logs
description: Pale, easily worked wood for furniture and tools.

name: Cedar Boards
description: Naturally fragrant and rot-resistant, ideal for storage.

name: Ironwood Logs
description: Dense timber used for rams, gates, and elite shields.

name: Heart Ebony
description: Dark, finely grained wood favored for arcane foci.

name: Bloodoak
description: Crimson-streaked hardwood rumored to drink in battlefields.

name: Worldtree Splinter
description: A mythic fragment of primordial wood that bends but never breaks.
